title: Citi's CEO Jane Fraser warns staff in memo: old habits are out, and performance is in
full_text:
Citi's CEO Jane Fraser warns staff in memo: old habits are out, and performance is in. Citi's CEO pledged to save billions by cutting jobs. A new memo and statements by the bank's top brass shed light on how that will play out in 2026.. Jane Fraser is the CEO of Citi.PATRICK T. FALLON/AFP via Getty Images
  • Jane Fraser, CEO of Citi, is making clear she expects employees to level up their game this year.
  • In a company m… [+4168 chars]
